com.edinarobotics.utils.math

Class Math1816

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.edinarobotics.utils.math.Math1816

  • public final class Math1816
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides common math functions that are not implemented elsewhere in WPILib.

    • Method Detail

      • signum

        public static double signum(double num)
        Implements a signum function. If the parameter is NaN or 0.0 returns the original value.
        If the parameter is positive, returns 1.0.
        If the parameter is negative, returns -1.0
        Parameters:
        num - The number whose signum will be returned.
        Returns:
        The signum of the number as described above.,

      • signum

        public static float signum(float num)
        Implements a signum function. If the parameter is NaN or 0.0 returns the original value.
        If the parameter is positive, returns 1.0.
        If the parameter is negative, returns -1.0
        Parameters:
        num - The number whose signum will be returned.
        Returns:
        The signum of the number as described above.,

      • coerceValue

        public static double coerceValue(double max,
                                 double min,
                                 double num)
        A convenience function that coerces a given number between maximum and minimum bounds. If the number is greater than the maximum value, return the maximum value; if the number is less than the minimum value, return the minimum value; otherwise, return the original number.
        Parameters:
        max - The maximum allowable value.
        min - The minimum allowable value.
        num - The number to be coerced.
        Returns:
        The given value coreced between the maximum and minimum limits.
